name: Bambacars
description:
Beat your friends in a crazy fast food race.

Bambacars is a party game for up to 6 players. It can be played with gamepad or keyboard.

Controls

Keyboard - Steer with arrows or wasd, drift with spacebar or left ctrl.

Gamepad - Steer with left thumbstick, accelerate with right trigger and drift with "A" (on XBox controllers) or "X" (on PS4 controllers)

Credits
  • Code - Vidar Nelson
  • Art - Mikael Hälström, Caroline Ljung, Anton Östlin
